Summary: Northbound B49 buses are detoured because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.
Description:
Northbound B49 buses are detoured because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.
While detoured, buses will not make stops from Rogers Ave/Empire Blvd to Rogers Ave/Eastern Pkwy.

Instead, buses will make stops along Bedford Ave, as requested.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Click here to view a map of the detoured route.

Summary: 74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
Description:
74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
accessibility icon The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside accessibility icon [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?We're replacing the elevators

Summary: Southbound B44 buses and B44-SBS buses, in both directions, are detoured because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.
Description:
Southbound B44 buses and B44-SBS buses, in both directions, are detoured because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.
While detoured, southbound B44 buses will not make stops from Nostrand Ave/Eastern Pkwy to Nostrand Ave/Empire Blvd.

Northbound B44-SBS buses will not stop at Nostrand Ave/Empire Blvd.
Southbound B44-SBS buses will not stop at Rogers Ave/Empire Blvd.

Instead, B44 and B44-SBS buses will make stops along Bedford Ave, as requested.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Click here to view a map of the detoured route.

Summary: B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Description:
B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Buses start and end their trips at a temporary location on 2nd Ave at 37th St and make an eastbound stop on 37th St and 4th Ave at the existing B70 bus stop.
(See map)

What's happening?
NYC DEP Sewer Replacement

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area.

Summary: B43 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.

B43 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork on Empire Blvd between Nostrand Ave and Bedford Ave.
While detoured, northbound buses will not make stops from Empire Blvd/Bedford Ave to Empire Blvd/Lamont Ct.

Southbound buses will not make stops from Empire Blvd/Brooklyn Ave to Washington Ave/Empire Blvd.

Instead, buses will make stops along Lefferts Ave in both directions, as requested.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Click here to view a map of the detoured route.

Summary: Q10 buses are detoured in both directions due to road work on Kew Gardens Rd and Union Tpke until approximately 6:00 AM tomorrow.
Description:
Q10 buses are detoured in both directions due to road work on Kew Gardens Rd and Union Tpke until approximately 6:00 AM tomorrow.
Kew Gardens-bound Q10 buses will not make stops from Lefferts Blvd/84th Av to Kew Gardens Rd/80th Rd.
JFK-bound Q10 buses will not make stops from Kew Gardens Rd/80th Rd to Lefferts Blvd/84th Av.

Q10 buses will start/end at the Q37 stop located at Kew Gardens Rd/Union Tpke.
While detoured, Kew Gardens-bound buses will make stops as requested along Metropolitan Av, Park Lane S and Union Tpke.


Click here to view a map of the detoured route.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available while buses are detoured.
